content: a modern take on the mesh shopper tote the perfect market bag for trips to your favourite shops carry produce books and any other treasures you find on your weekend adventures this bag is lightweight durable stylish and would also be handy for a quick trip to the beach throw in a towel sunscreen and a good book please note that this is an ad-free detailed pdf version of a pattern that can be found for free on www lakesideloops com in an effort to make our pattern as convenient and easy to read as possible the pattern includes **written pattern pictures chart video tutorial** left hand pattern available upon request *all patterns and photographs are the property of lakeside loops©* **all finished products from our patterns may be used for local sales and sold online ** thank you for looking kind wishes lakeside loops www lakesideloops com
